name: Social Punch Marketing
description:
We are a full-service marketing company. We offer strategic planning, content development, public relations, inbound marketing, WordPress design and training, email design, text and mobile apps, lead generation and CRM services.
We work with small businesses, non-profits, theaters, high profile personalities, restaurants and real estate brokers. Nick Cavarra is an Authorized Local Area Expert and Solutions Provider for the Constant Contact Suite of Products.
